text: Fred Postal in 1902. Frederick Postal was the co-owner of the Washington Senators of the American League with Ban Johnson from through . In 1903, Johnson and Postal sold the Senators to Thomas C. Noyes. ==References== Minnesota Twins owners Category:Major League Baseball owners Category:Washington Senators (1901–1960) owners Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Fred Postal
